General.Name: Acreage Holdings Inc
General.Description: Acreage Holdings, Inc. operates in cannabis industry in the United States. It is involved in cultivating and processing cannabis plants; manufacturing branded consumer products; distributing cannabis flower and manufactured products; and retailing dosable cannabis products to consumers. The company's products appeal to medical and adult recreational use customers. Acreage Holdings, Inc. was founded in 2011 and is based in New York, New York.
General.Address: 366 Madison Avenue, New York, NY, United States, 10017
